Name: Starlight Illusion: Grandis Daily Mission Reward
Desc:
Increases rewards from the Grandis Daily
quests.

The effect only applies to Daily quests in Cernium, Hotel Arcs, Odium, Shangri-La, Arteria, and Carcion.

Name.Old: Power from Beyond the Dimensions: Grandis Daily Mission Reward
Name.New: Starlight Illusion: Grandis Daily Mission Reward
